#Setup directory paths
SET(ROOT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
SET(HEADERS ${ROOT}/headers)
SET(SOURCES ${ROOT}/sources)

#Initiate source files
FILE(GLOB RESAMPLE_HEADERS ${HEADERS}/*.h)
FILE(GLOB RESAMPLE_SOURCES ${SOURCES}/*.c)

#Create library
ADD_LIBRARY(resample SHARED ${RESAMPLE_HEADERS} ${RESAMPLE_SOURCES})
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(resample PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE C)

#Install file
INSTALL(TARGETS resample DESTINATION external/resample)
